metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41804 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unauthorized error injection in Intel(R) SGX or Intel(R) TDX for some Intel(R) Xeon(R) Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. It was discovered that some Intel(R) Xeon(R) Processors did not properly restrict error injection for Intel(R) SGX or Intel(R) TDX. A local privileged user could use this to further escalate their privileges.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
